title: Need help with dealing with a disgusting player
body: Ok so I've encountered a dude that said he'd kill my whole family and kill myself etc. As a person who has been through depression- anyone saying this bullshit is a disgusting human who doesn't understand what they're saying and is merely expressing what they want to do to them-self (I assume). I was unable to screenshot the chat but got a few pics of the hate speech with my ipod (lol). I did send a report after game for hate speech. Is that enough for Riot to recognize?

replies.body: Honestly, I think it comes down to what you feel is enough in this situation. If you don't think the post-game reporting system is sufficient, sent Riot a support ticket. At least that way you know, for sure, that it's getting looked at instead of getting chucked around a system for several more games while they rack up enough reports for something to happen.
Yeah that's what I think. A case like this should be looked at straight away. Rather than be dealt with by system. I am yet to figure out how to send a ticket..

> I am yet to figure out how to send a ticket..

There's a link to the support section at the top of the page labelled "support" (what else?), then you click the link at the top of that page labelled "submit a ticket".

Here's a link as well: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Note: Apparently you need to be signed in to submit a ticket now.

There's no category for "player behaviour" but I usually just go with "I have a question" then "Game and Features - General Questions" and they'll redirect it to the Player Behaviour team.
Cheers there's really no option for it ey which is what has prevented me from doing these reports.

send them a request through [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and it should be looked at.

Good job at not name and shaming on the boards to.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thank you.. How do I exactly send them a ticket though? I can't find anywhere I can send them anything

Okay heres a step by step process:
1) Click on the word 'HERE' in my previous comment and it will take you to the riot support page.
2) On the top of the Riot support page their should be a tab called 'Submit a request'.
3) Choose the topic. (then it will redirect you to another page)
4) Where you will fill out a lot of questions so that riot can assist you.
5) Riot will then hopefully contact you within the next 3-5 days.

nice job on taking a picture of his username.Next time just take a picture of the chat and instnatly mute him.We non-toxic players don't need to get dragged down to the level of stupidity that the toxic players possess.
I think it has a big part of maturity. Some people have sad lives and get a kick out of cyber bullying like this guy seemed to.

Yeah, Riot's system is really good at picking up on in-game chat toxicity. He's probably been punished by now. 

Next time you might want to just mute before it gets to that level of toxicity. Your call though, it's a good thing someone is reporting these guys.
Yeah I gotta mute. I ignored most of it but he just kept going ey trying to amp me up or something..
